pr_title: Remove DocBook which is no longer used

timeline.message: Remove DocBook which is no longer used

timeline.bodyText:
Do we really still need this git-commit-id-plugin?
Do you have some logic in docs based on the current commit status?
timeline.author: artembilan

replies.bodyText: Yeah I don't think we really use it. I'll take it out.
replies.author: meltsufin

replies.bodyText:
This mostly looks good to me. We've been abandoning Docbook and have (I think) gotten it out of all the projects now (though there may be old files sitting around, as here).
Why did you remove the two lines in docs/src/main/asciidoc/_configprops.adoc? Have we dropped those options?
replies.author: Buzzardo

replies.bodyText: @Buzzardo this file seems to be auto-updated every time you run the docs build, and indeed we have removed some properties in recent PRs.
replies.author: meltsufin

replies.bodyText:
I did a little digging in the code and can see that spring.cloud.gcp.secretmanager.secret-name-prefix and spring.cloud.gcp.secretmanager.versions have been removed, so I'm good with dropping those two lines.
This PR looks good to me.
Thanks for the cleanup. Always nice to remove 3,700 unneeded lines.
replies.author: Buzzardo
